geo

Interface Shape2D

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Drawable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Ellipse, Polygon, Rectangle, RegularHexagon, Square, Triangle

    public interface Shape2D
extends Drawable
    This interface is for 2D shapes that have area, perimeter and fill methods. It extends Drawable, since all 2D shapes are also Drawable objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double area() 
      void fill() 
      double perimeter() 

      • Methods inherited from interface geo.Drawable

        draw, translate
